ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] re: Class Balance
ygData.msgSnippet: I m lucky in that my druid s main group already includes two clerics.  I m only the emergency healer, and am the secondary nuker.  I am generally right there
ygData.messageBody:
I'm lucky in that my druid's main group already includes two clerics. I'm
only the emergency healer, and am the secondary nuker. I am generally right
there waded in swinging away and nuking/DoTing as I can get them in. I
rarely get hit till the poor bard needs to back out or flee.

Kitasi
Draffut Karana's servant

-----Original Message-----
From: Perhaps a Princess... [mailto:sarah@...]
Sent: Thursday, March 16, 2000 10:31 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] re: Class Balance


From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>

>-----Original Message-----
>From: jhenders@... [mailto:jhenders@...]
>Sent: Thursday, March 16, 2000 9:25 AM

>On Thu, Mar 16/00, Chris Musson <CMusson@...> wrote:

>> Example of agressively stupid:
>[snip]
>
>Back in my early 20's I met a cleric in Mistmoore who told the group he
>planned to specialize in evocation and had chosen a cleric because
>Wizards couldn't wear enough armor. I think he made it to the mid 30's
>before his reputation as the cleric who didn't heal kept him from
>getting groups anywhere.
>
>At least for the first few months of a server's life, it's a very small
>world.
>
>He probably restarted as a druid.

*sigh* Druids didn't used to have this rep...

I know my druid is sitting flat on her butt medding for mana most
all the time. And most all of her mana goes to healing people!
She will snare and damage shield the main tank and everything
else is healing and keeping buffs up (And if I have a Shaman along,
I let the Shaman buff and focus more on healing)

I am NOT looking forward to when my healing no longer does as much
good.

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Faerain Wanderer, level 20 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 15 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro (Freeport)
/
Meara, level 14 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
<lvl 5 paladin>
